column4: this is my favorite. Get the classic with tomato sauce
column5: extra cheese and sausage. Ordering system for those dining-in is a bit different than other pizzerias
column6: since these deep dish pizzas take so long to bake. You order your pizza at a counter and are then seated. If you order take-out
column7: it takes about 45 minutes. My pizza was ready right on time.
